com.phunware.core.cme

Class CMEModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.phunware.core.CoreModule
      • com.phunware.core.cme.CMEModule

  • public final class CMEModule
extends CoreModule
    This module can be used to access MaaS Content Management System. Get an instance of the CMEModule to install into the Core session.
    See Also:
    PwCoreSession.installModules(com.phunware.core.CoreModule...)

    • Field Summary

      Used to specify that no value is being used as a parameter.

      • getContainers

        public Containers getContainers(android.content.Context context)
                         throws PwException
        Get all available containers This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        Returns:
        Returns Containers object with the available containers.
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

                              String containerId)
                       throws PwException
        Get a container by its associated id. This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        containerId - The specified container id.
        Returns:
        Returns a Container object.
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • getSchemas

        public Schemas getSchemas(android.content.Context context)
                   throws PwException
        Get available schemas up to the first page limit. To get other pages use getSchemas(android.content.Context, int, int). This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        Returns:
        A Schemas object.
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • getSchemas

        public Schemas getSchemas(android.content.Context context,
                          int limit,
                          int offset)
                   throws PwException
        Get available schemas. Use the limit and offset to define pages. This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        limit - Specifies the number of results to return. Max limit value is 10.
        offset - Specifies the number of results to offset.
        Returns:
        A Schemas object.
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • getSchema

        public Schema getSchema(android.content.Context context,
                        String schemaId)
                 throws PwException
        Return a Schema object with the specified schema Id. This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        schemaId - The requested schema Id.
        Returns:
        A schema object specified by id.
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • getStructures

        public Structures getStructures(android.content.Context context,
                                String containerId,
                                int depth,
                                boolean withSchema)
                         throws PwException
        This method is used to get a list of structure items starting at the root. This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        containerId - The ID of the container to get the structure for.
        depth - The depth to traverse into child structure items. If the depth is set to 0 then no child structure items will be returned if the depth is set to 1 then the immediate child structure will be returned, and so on. To get the full hierarchy of children use -1.
        withSchema - If true then the schema will be returned for structure items that have one.
        Returns:
        Returns Structures object containing the list of structures.
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • getStructure

        public Structure getStructure(android.content.Context context,
                              int structureId,
                              String containerId,
                              int depth,
                              boolean withSchema)
                       throws PwException
        This method is used to get a structure for a specified structure id. This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        structureId - The ID of the structure.
        containerId - The ID of the container to get the structure for.
        depth - The depth to traverse into child structure items. If the depth is set to 0 then no child structure items will be returned if the depth is set to 1 then the immediate child structure will be returned. To get the full hierarchy of children use -1.
        withSchema - If true then the schema will be returned for structure items that have one.
        Returns:
        Returns a Structure object
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • getStructure

        public Structure getStructure(android.content.Context context,
                              String containerId,
                              int structureId,
                              int depth,
                              boolean withSchema)
                       throws PwException
        This method is used to get a structure for a specified structure id. This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        containerId - The ID of the container to get the structure for.
        structureId - The ID of the structure.
        depth - The depth to traverse into child structure items. If the depth is set to 0 then no child structure items will be returned if the depth is set to 1 then the immediate child structure will be returned. To get the full hierarchy of children use -1.
        withSchema - If true then the schema will be returned for structure items that have one.
        Returns:
        Returns a Structure object
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • getContents

        public Contents getContents(android.content.Context context,
                            String containerId,
                            int structureId,
                            String parentId,
                            int limit,
                            int offset)
                     throws PwException
        Get a list of contents from the structure level. This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        containerId - The ID of the container to get the structure for.
        structureId - The ID of the structure to start at. The content will be retrieved starting at the level in the structure hierarchy that the specified structure resides.
        parentId - The parent ID of the content associated to the specified structure.
        limit - Specifies the number of results to return. This is useful for pagination. Max limit value is 100.
        offset - Specifies the number of results to offset. This is useful for pagination.
        Returns:
        Returns a JSON object.
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • getContents

        public Contents getContents(android.content.Context context,
                            String containerId,
                            String parentId,
                            int limit,
                            int offset)
                     throws PwException
        Get a list of contents from the root level. This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        containerId - The ID of the container to get the structure for.
        parentId - The parent ID of the content associated to the specified structure.
        limit - Specifies the number of results to return. This is useful for pagination. Max limit value is 100.
        offset - Specifies the number of results to offset. This is useful for pagination.
        Returns:
        Returns a JSON object.
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • addContent

        public void addContent(android.content.Context context,
                       String containerId,
                       int structureId,
                       String parentId,
                       org.json.JSONObject data)
                throws PwException
        This method is deprecated and will be removed on the next major release. Use addContent(android.content.Context, String, int, String, org.json.JSONObject) instead. This method is used to save new content where parent content exists. This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        containerId - The ID of the container to get the structure for.
        structureId - The ID of the structure the content is associated to.
        parentId - The ID of the parent content item. This is used to link up any dynamic children of this structure item that may have already been created, when the associated structure is itself within a dynamic structure item. When this is the case, the only way to know which child content path is associated with this parent content data is to supply the parent to this content item.
        data - An object containing the structure data. The structure of this object is based on the associated schema. Data must be in a JSON structure
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • addContent

        public void addContent(android.content.Context context,
                       String containerId,
                       int structureId,
                       org.json.JSONObject data)
                throws PwException
        This method is used to save new content where no parent content exists. This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        containerId - The ID of the container to get the structure for.
        structureId - The ID of the structure the content is associated to.
        data - An object containing the structure data. The structure of this object is based on the associated schema. Data must be in a JSON structure
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • updateContent

        @Deprecated
public void updateContent(android.content.Context context,
                                      String contentId,
                                      org.json.JSONObject newContent,
                                      int structureId)
                               throws PwException
        Deprecated. 
        This method is used to update the existing content item with the specified content id. Parameters inside the JSON data must follow these rules: : If a parameter IS NOT specified, it will retain its current value. If a parameter IS specified, but with an empty value, then the value will be cleared. This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        contentId - The specified content Id.
        newContent - The updated content.
        structureId - The ID of the structure the content is associated to.
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • updateContent

        @Deprecated
public void updateContent(android.content.Context context,
                                      int structureId,
                                      String contentId,
                                      String parentId,
                                      org.json.JSONObject newContent)
                               throws PwException
        Deprecated. 
        This method is used to update the existing content item with the specified content id. Parameters inside the JSON data must follow these rules: : If a parameter IS NOT specified, it will retain its current value. If a parameter IS specified, but with an empty value, then the value will be cleared. This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        structureId - The ID of the structure the content is associated to.
        contentId - The specified content Id.
        parentId - The specified parent content ID.
        newContent - The updated content. If a parameter IS NOT specified, it will retain its current value. If a parameter IS specified, but with an empty value, then the value will be cleared.
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • deleteContent

        public void deleteContent(android.content.Context context,
                          String contentId,
                          boolean traverse)
                   throws PwException
        This method is used to delete a specific content item. If the associated structure for the content is a dynamic object structure residing in a parent array structure then all child content will be deleted as well. However, if the associated structure for the content is a static structure item then only the specified content will be deleted. This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        contentId - The specified content Id.
        traverse - If set to true then child content will be deleted as well. This parameter is only useful when the content ID is associated to a static structure item.
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • deleteContent

        public void deleteContent(android.content.Context context,
                          String contentId,
                          boolean traverse,
                          Callback<Response> cb)
                   throws PwException
        This method is used to delete a specific content item. If the associated structure for the content is a dynamic object structure residing in a parent array structure then all child content will be deleted as well. However, if the associated structure for the content is a static structure item then only the specified content will be deleted. This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        contentId - The specified content Id.
        traverse - If set to true then child content will be deleted as well. This parameter is only useful when the content ID is associated to a static structure item.
        cb - Callback for responses from server
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

                                     String contentId)
                              throws PwException
        This method is used to delete all child elements within an array structure item. This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        contentId - The specified content Id.
        Throws:
        PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.
